lom:description.lom:string:
During the last decade rapid growth has occurred in the field of geographic information. With this growth have come diverse notions concerning which direction the field should take. To ensure that a coherent view emerges, a broad representation of universities and professional associations have come together to form the University Consortium for Geographic Information Science (UCGIS).
UCGIS Mission bullet To serve as an effective, unified voice for the geographic information science research community; bullet To foster multidisciplinary research and education; and bullet To promote the informed and responsible use of geographic information science and geographic analysis for the benefit of society.

lom:title.lom:string: University Consortium for Geographic Information Science (UCGIS)
